ranks.text: Automatically unlocked on 10/29. Unlocks the Baton Pass ability, allowing Goro to pass his turn to another character after a 1 More. Unlocks the Follow Up ability which lets Goro attack the enemy in a follow-up after Joker on occasion. Unlocks Hairsen Recovery, which lets Goro occasionally help allies up when they're impacted by a status effect. Unlocks Detective Talk, which lets him step in when shadow negotiation is failed.
Automatically unlocks throughout the course of the sixth palace.
Automatically unlocks later in the sixth palace. Unlocks Second Awakening, evolving Goro's Persona to its final form, Loki.
